record.title: Advancing sepsis diagnosis and immunotherapy machine learning-driven identification of stable molecular biomarkers and therapeutic targets.
record.subjects: Sepsis diagnosis ; Sepsis therapy ; Sepsis genetics ; Sepsis immunology ; Machine Learning ; Immunotherapy methods ; Biomarkers metabolism ; Humans ; Gene Regulatory Networks ; Algorithms
record.abstract: Declarations. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests. Consent for publication: All listed authors consent to the submission, and all data are used with the consent of the person generating the data.
